titleStmt.title: An ansvver to a speech without doores: or, Animadversions upon an unsafe and dangerous answer to the Scotch-papers, printed under the name of Mr. Challener his speech, which while it offereth to reach a blow at the Scotch-papers, doth indeed strike at the honour of the Parliament, and interest of the kingdome of England.
titleStmt.author: Birkenhead, John, Sir, 1616-1679.

titleStmt.title: An ansvver to a speech without doores: or, Animadversions upon an unsafe and dangerous answer to the Scotch-papers, printed under the name of Mr. Challener his speech, which while it offereth to reach a blow at the Scotch-papers, doth indeed strike at the honour of the Parliament, and interest of the kingdome of England.
titleStmt.author: Birkenhead, John, Sir, 1616-1679.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
